message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS

This paper deals with text summarization, which is a natural language processing task. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also mentions the use of machine learning, which suggests that it could belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.LG (Machine Learning), or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper deals with discovering optimal combinations of features, which could also place it in cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
